## Research Sources Checklist

### Daily Monitoring

- [ ] arXiv.org (AI security, safety)
- [ ] Hacker News
- [ ] GitHub Trending
- [ ] Twitter/X AI researchers
- [ ] Competitor GitHub repos

### Weekly Review

- [ ] Papers with Code
- [ ] Hugging Face blog
- [ ] OpenAI blog
- [ ] Anthropic blog
- [ ] Google AI blog
- [ ] r/MachineLearning
- [ ] r/LocalLLaMA
- [ ] Competitor documentation

### Monthly Deep Dive

- [ ] Conference proceedings (NeurIPS, ICML, etc.)
- [ ] Security conferences (DEF CON, Black Hat)
- [ ] Industry reports
- [ ] Market research
- [ ] User surveys

## Prototype Evaluation Template

### Prototype: [Name]

**Date:** YYYY-MM-DD  
**Researcher:** [Name]  
**Category:** Security | Cost | Integration | DX  

**Objective:**
[What are we trying to validate?]

**Approach:**
[Technical approach used]

**Implementation:**
- **Language:** Python | TypeScript | Both
- **Dependencies:** [list]
- **Lines of Code:** [number]
- **Time to Build:** [hours]

**Test Results:**

**Performance:**
- Latency: [ms] (target: [ms])
- Throughput: [req/s] (target: [req/s])
- Memory: [MB] (target: [MB])
- CPU: [%] (target: [%])

**Accuracy:**
- Precision: [%] (target: [%])
- Recall: [%] (target: [%])
- F1 Score: [%] (target: [%])
- False Positive Rate: [%] (target: [%])

**Test Cases:**
- Total: [number]
- Passed: [number]
- Failed: [number]
- Edge cases covered: [number]

**Evaluation:**

**Strengths:**
- [Strength 1]
- [Strength 2]

**Weaknesses:**
- [Weakness 1]
- [Weakness 2]

**Risks:**
- [Risk 1]
- [Risk 2]

**Recommendation:**
- [ ] âœ… Proceed to specification
- [ ] ğŸ”„ Iterate on prototype
- [ ] âŒ Abandon approach

**Next Steps:**
1. [Step 1]
2. [Step 2]
3. [Step 3]

**Links:**
- Code: [link]
- Demo: [link]
- Test Results: [link]
